full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RTA DANG NOR RA LUG DANG KHYI SOGS TSE THAR RNAMS BCAS PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(GZHAN YANG SHIS BRJOD CING RIGS PA BRJOD, GA-YANG RA VA SGO BZHI'I TSE THAR GTOR TSUL DANG @011B DPA' CHAS SOGS BSRUNG MA'I DBANG PO RNAMS LA 'BUL TSUL NGO MNGAR RGYAN GYI 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGAGS 'CHANG RNAL 'BYOR BA KHA CHEN THOR DPONG KYI RGYAL KHAMS SU SBYAR BA'I YIG CHA DANG, BLA MA BRAG SPUNG PA'I MDZAD PA'I YIG CHA GNYIS LA GZHI BYAS, CUNG ZAD KHA SKANG DGOS PA RNAMS KYI KHA SKANG NAS LEGS PA'I 'DON CHA THAMS CAD PHYOGS GCIG TU GZHAN PHAN GYI BSAM PA'I PHYIR DU BSGRIGS PA DGE ZHING BKRA SHIS 'ON KYANG BOD KYIS CHA 'DI RU TSE THAR RNAMS TSIG GI SGO NAS LHA 'DI LTA BU LA RTZON ZER BA DANG, YIG CHA RNAMS BON LUGS SU DAR 'DUG PA 'DI YANG MI 'THANG BSAM, AU RGYAN PADMA'I GSUNGS PA LAS, DUS RAN BSKAL BA'I SNYIGS MA LA, BKA' BZHIN MI BYED RANG BZO YIS, BAN DANG BON GYI LHA SRUNGS RNAMS, GSOL SOR GSOL MCHOD BYED PA DANG, DGE SDIG 'CHOL BAR SPYOD PA'I DUS, MI 'DOD SNA TSOGS 'BYUN BAR DES, ZHES GSUNGS SO, DES 'DI BZHIN DU RANG RANG GI LHA BSRUNGS DANG LUGS KYIS SGO NAS MCHOD DGOS ZHI LUNG LAS GSUNGS PA KUN GYI YID CHES PA'I GNAS SU BGYIS SHIG, MGYOG BRIS YIN PAS KHYAD MKHAS PA RNAMS KYIS THUGS KHREL MI MDZAD LEGS, ,)
